Google Nexus 4

Notes

This device is manufactured by LG and can also be handled via LGUP using tot files

Unlock

As far as we are aware the nexus 4 was never shipped in a sim locked state

Flashing


This guide will only cover flashing the device as a nexus, please see its LG page for LGUP instructions

  1. Boot the device into bootloader mode by holding Volume Down and power
  2. Connect the device to the PC and open its folder on the server\
  3. Run Unlock.bat This will remove the bootloader lock (depending on version you may need to enable OEM Unlock
  4. Once the bootloader is unlocked you can begin the flash by running flash-all.bat
  5. Once the flash is complete reboot to bootloader once more
  6. Run Lock.bat to re-lock the bootloader
